field.name: summary
field.value: When using child containers, parent components are released with child container in certain cases

field.name: description
field.value:
The issue is described here: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11189912/castle-windsor-bug-resolving-singleton-through-child-container
Basically dependencies of a parent component being resolved via child container may end up being managed by the child, rather than the parent, and when the child container is disposed these dependencies are released even though they may be required by the parent or other child containers still.
This behaviour was introduced as part of #IOC-115 but is wrong. Dependencies should only ever go up the hierarchy chain, never down.
